entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Muskoka
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:53 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 01:56 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -2.1°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: S 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow and local blowing snow beginning this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
